item.title: Vishvas's notes
item.description: Introduction The worlds of ideas are distinct from the directly experienced world of sensations. They can be accessed only by the intellect (aka the questioning mind) and assessed by sentiment. Motivation These are my personal maps to those worlds. The process of making them was quite addictive and satisfying once. I once had an obsessive (unpragmatic) need to understand everything from the very basic principles. These were written for my own edification- often as part of thinking aloud or thinking carefully.
